title: Denise Jannah - The Madness of Our Love (Blue Note,2000) RESEED
description:
MP3/192kbps

"Her voice is so direct, the delivery so fresh and clear that she will surely withstand the test of time. ...With a piano trio providing supple support throughout, Jannah mixes standards and originals, slow ballads and up-tempo romps that nicely highlight her warm, articulate singing and versatility." - JazzTimes

Pesonnel: Denise Jannah (vocals); Bert Van Den Brink (piano); Ira Coleman (bass); Carl Allen (drums); Khalil Bell (shaker). Recorded at Avatar Studios, New York, New York on June 1 & 2, 1999.

Track Listings:

1. Dearly Beloved
2. Wide Awake
3. Round Midnight
4. My Favorite Things
5. Madness Of Our Love
6. Just You Just Me
7. Le Sourir De Mon Amour
8. My Foolish Heart/Fall In Love Too Easily
9. Softly As In A Morning Sunrise
10. If Only
11. Harlem Nocturnes
12. Teach Me Tonight
